name: Bitbucket Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Bitbucket Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Bitbucket events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: workspace | (必填项)

workspace.name: workspace
workspace.description: The repository of which to listen to the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspace.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: The repository of which to listen to the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

events.name: events
events.description: The events to listen to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Names or IDs | 作用: The events to listen to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

repository.name: repository
repository.description: The repository of which to listen to the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
repository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Name or ID | 作用: The repository of which to listen to the events. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
